text: Marcelo Demoliner and Rodrigo Guidolin were the defenders of championship title, but they lost to Ricardo Hocevar and Caio Zampieri in the first round. Franco Ferreiro and André Sá were champions after beating André Ghem and Simone Vagnozzi in two sets (6–4, 6–3). ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== * Doubles Draw Aberto Santa Catarina De Tenis - Doubles 2010 Doubles
title: 2010 Aberto Santa Catarina De Tenis – Doubles
